title: Ghost of a Saber Tooth Tiger - Midnight Sun
description:
Ghost of a Saber Tooth Tiger is a band that was formed in 2008 by Sean Lennon and his girlfriend Charlotte Kemp Muhl. Midnight Sun is their first full length album and was well worth the four year wait after their EP La Carotte Bleue. 

Midnight Sun has a 70s psychedelic rock feel that could be compared to Pink Floyd in their Syd Barett era, but these guys are definitely something unique.
